item.title: LeetCode Daily Question: #1382
item.description: Problem Given the root of a BST, return a balanced BST with the same node values. If there is more than one answer, return any of them. Key Takeaways An inorder traversal of a BST returns a list of sorted values. Whenever recursing using indices, make sure to check if the start index ever exceeds the end index as a base case. Calculate the midpoint between two indices as (start + (end - start) / 2).
